definition[0]: used to say that you have heard that something is true, although you are not completely sure about it
example[0]: Apparently the company is losing a lot of money.
example[1]: I wasnâ€™t there, but apparently it went well.
definition[1]: according to the way someone looks or a situation appears, although you cannot be sure
example[2]: She turned to face him, her anger apparently gone.
